SPGE.TA.summary: Supergas Energy Ltd. engages in the liquefied petroleum gas (LPG), and natural gas and electricity businesses in Israel. It is involved in the marketing, sale, and distribution of LPG and LPG products; and marketing and sale of natural gas, electricity, and thermal energy. The company also supplies gas balloons. It serves the residential, agricultural, commercial, and industrial sectors. The company was founded in 1953 and is based in Netanya, Israel. Supergas Energy Ltd. is a subsidiary of Elco Ltd.
